data.text: Mwa kunyada kwake munthu woyipa asaka wofowoka,
Iye amatamandira zokhumba za mu mtima wake;
Mwa kunyada kwake woyipa safunafuna Mulungu;
Mʼkamwa mwake mwadzaza matemberero, mabodza ndi zoopseza;
Iye amabisalira anthu pafupi ndi midzi,
Amabisalira anthu ngati mkango pa zitsamba.
Iye amati mu mtima mwake, “Mulungu wayiwala,
Dzukani Yehova! Onetsani dzanja lanu Inu Mulungu.
Nʼchifukwa chiyani munthu woyipa amachitira chipongwe Mulungu?
Komatu Inu Mulungu, mumazindikira mavuto ndi zosautsa,
Thyolani dzanja la woyipitsitsa ndi la munthu woyipa;
Mumamva Inu Yehova, zokhumba za osautsidwa;
